channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Givaldo Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Givaldo Silva

item.title: Top 5 Forex Profiles
item.description: Social media provide a lot of information that can be used to interpret sentiment of the market and it can help to predict the exchange rate, a lot of Twitter profiles attract thousands of followers giving them “Signals”, information about the forex market, these profiles tell them when they should buy, sell, or be neutral. The main goal of this project is to find the best 5 profiles on Twitter regarding forex financial market, the profiles with higher accuracy in their prediction.

item.title: Predicting diabetes
item.description: In this modern time, we have a much easier life than some decades ago, but it also brought some problems, life is so fast that sometimes we don’t have enough time to prepare healthy food, we eat fast food and don’t practice physical activities. Diabetes is one of the most common diseases in our era, affecting millions of people of all ages over the world. Diabetes affects people when they have a high level of blood glucose, this can happen for problems to produce insulin.

item.title: Spam detector
item.description: A lot of words, symbols and sometimes numbers are not good for prediction, actually it can have a negative effect in the algorithms, then, we need to clean as much as possible and try to get just the key words that really represent a Spam or ham email. https://github.com/givaldofrancisco/spam_detector/blob/main/Assignment%201%20-%20%20V4.ipynb
